verbs.description: [ARG1: sooners] [V: rise] [ARGM-LOC: in both polls] oklahoma football team moved up in both major polls released sunday ou moved up one spot in both the associated press and coaches polls from 7th to 6th alabama remains number one in both polls ou is 8 - 1 on the season after beating texas tech 51 - 46 in lubbock on saturday night west virginia mountaineers norman oklahoma sooners oklahoma sooners west virginia gaylord family oklahoma memorial stadium
